introduction.overview: On Steemit there are several bots with various purposes that can be summoned by mentioning their names. Anyone can create these.
introduction.original_bot: There was originally a bot that would greet all new users with a large amount of SP
introduction.recommendation: Groups on Facebook associated with Steemit should teach people how to make STEEM bots and accept STEEM bots in their group

blockchain_bot_philosophy.internet_bot_problem: On most of the internet there is an issue with bots (Russian Troll bots, spam viagra ads)
blockchain_bot_philosophy.blockchain_advantage: On the Blockchain there is a strong need for bots
blockchain_bot_philosophy.trade_bots: Trade bots sit on the market and buy and sell micro price changes to earn you money, similar to Stock Exchange bots where you pay for your account to mimic an established trader
blockchain_bot_philosophy.key_insight: On the Blockchain what bots do is earn you money without you having to do anything
blockchain_bot_philosophy.future_implication: Once this is understood it won't be an issue for people to begin to be replaced by Robots in the work place. Blockchain bots are like having Robots that earn you money.

concept.bot_creation: System where you select bot features, it learns from you and asks questions
concept.evolution: You could give it new features, others could copy your bot if shared on social media
concept.viral_growth: New ones would learn and be added to, eventually unrecognizable, shared and copied always evolving

bazillion_beings_project.blockchain_integration: These bots would have been on a blockchain earning cryptocurrency that would pay you and Bazillion Beings for hosting and development
bazillion_beings_project.capabilities: They would make blogs, find pictures, music, local places, people, or anything

treeplanter.purpose: Allows you to support others and help plant trees

resteem_bots.description: Resteem bots basically do the STEEM version of Sharing or Retweeting your post
resteem_bots.best_use_case: Good if you have content that is extremely consumable, maybe with an interesting picture and title, because all a resteem does is put some eyeballs on a post
resteem_bots.strategy: If you use Resteem Bots correctly, as part of a overall larger plan, maybe with human resteems, social media, bringing friends and family members in to work with you, making a group on Facebook or Minds, etc
resteem_bots.note: Each bot is 1 user, so the more other things you have going on and the more bots you use the better off you are

economics.for_spender: Resteem bots are not inherently profitable to the person spending STEEM to get a Resteem
economics.for_bot_owner: Bot owner earns money as the bot is paid, and when a post they Resteem early becomes popular
economics.community_support: If everyone wants to support people, follow the Resteem bots and Resteem their Resteems
economics.self_income: Resteem bots are also a good way to earn money yourself

resteem_bots.vote_timing_formula: There have been tons of posts and development on the formula of when a bot should vote for a post (after X amount of votes or earnings) and your bot can use these formulas to almost predict popular posts and earn you STEEM

upvote_bots.description: An Upvote bot is inherently profitable for everyone
upvote_bots.mechanism: You send STEEM to the bot increasing their voting power, then they Upvote your post, giving you money. Some bots pay you a % of the curation reward.
upvote_bots.note: You can also make these bots, but need SP loaded on them for them to have any real purpose for a customer

bot_list.mechanism: include your post in the memo to get a share of a 100% vote

bot_list.name: @sleeplesswhale
bot_list.note: It never sleeps. Votes proportionally divided among all bidders

expert_systems_context.introduction: The easiest way to understand bots more complex than this is to start with MYCIN

mycin.description: A system used by doctors to identify Meningitis
mycin.mechanism: Goes through a prompt that asked them questions about what they were seeing and the patient's experience, and would give a result
mycin.legacy: Became a whole ecosystem of AI that was not in fact AI as it did not learn, but instead used a database to get to a resolution

expert_systems_definition.name: Expert Systems
expert_systems_definition.comparison: Equivalent of a basic modern chatbot, with a higher degree of specialization and information
expert_systems_definition.function: Basically guides a professional through their procedures, and ensures they know everything they need to know about what they are doing
expert_systems_definition.foundation: Based on IF this THEN that, which are called 'If Then Statements' and are the basics of coding and programming
expert_systems_definition.steem_application: This is basically the route to look down to create more functional STEEM bots
